item.title: Denmark lauds constructive talks with U.S. over Greenland: ‘Now we are back on track’
item.description: It comes shortly after Trump announced a framework deal regarding the Arctic island and backed away from imposing tariffs on several European countrie...

item.title: U.S. handing over seized tanker to Venezuela, officials say: Reuters
item.description: The United States is handing over to Venezuela a tanker that it seized this month, two U.S. officials told Reuters on Wednesday.

item.title: Government shutdown: Republicans consider escape hatch as Congress careens toward deadline
item.description: Much of the U.S. government is poised to shut down early Saturday morning unless Congress approves spending measures.

item.title: 'ICE is not a law unto itself,' Minnesota judge says after immigrant released following contempt threat
item.description: Minneapolis has become a focal point of immigration enforcement actions by the Trump administration, whose agents have killed two U.S. citizens there.

item.title: Fed has not yet complied with subpoenas as Powell probe continues: Source
item.description: Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell says the criminal investigation resulted from frustration by President Donald Trump over interest rate decisions.
